function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unclear legal basis for pseudonymization conversions","Impact":"Risk of data manipulation and loss of scientific value","Mitigation":"Establish clear legal guidelines for pseudonymization conversions","Technologies":"Legal frameworks and regulations","People":"Data governance authorities, policymakers, researchers","Owner":"EU Member States, legislative bodies"},{"Description":"Inadequate data governance and quality control","Impact":"Risk of compromised data integrity and interoperability","Mitigation":"Implementation of strong data governance and quality control measures","Technologies":"Data governance frameworks, quality control processes","People":"Digital health authority, data governance authorities","Owner":"EU Member States, digital health authority"},{"Description":"Lack of interoperability in cross-border exchange of electronic health data","Impact":"Obstacle to seamless data exchange and collaboration","Mitigation":"Development of a common infrastructure for cross-border data exchange, self-certification schemes for EHR systems","Technologies":"Cross-border data exchange infrastructure, self-certification schemes","People":"Health data administrators, regulatory bodies","Owner":"EU Member States, regulatory bodies"}]}
